verses.verse: And this is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them to <S%H6942>hallow<s%> them, to minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>: <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>,

And <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H1101>tempered<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>: of <S%H2406>wheaten<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> them.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> them into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5536>basket<s%>, and <S%H7126>bring<s%> them in the <S%H5536>basket<s%>, with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and shalt <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%>, and the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>, and <S%H640>gird<s%> him with the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>:
And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4701>mitre<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> upon the <S%H4701>mitre<s%>.
Then shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him.
And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> upon them.

And thou shalt <S%H2296>gird<s%> them with <S%H73>girdles<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H2280>put<s%> the <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> on them: and the priest's <S%H3550>office<s%> shall be theirs for a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H4390%H3027>consecrate<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And thou shalt cause a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> to be <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with thy <S%H676>finger<s%>, and <S%H8210>pour<s%> all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> that is above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon them, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

But the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and his <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and his <S%H6569>dung<s%>, shalt thou <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: it is a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>.

¶ Thou shalt also <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> in <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, and <S%H7364>wash<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> of him, and his <S%H3767>legs<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them unto his <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, and unto his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6999>burn<s%> the whole <S%H352>ram<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: it is a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>put<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%>.

Then shalt thou <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> of his <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the right <S%H241>ear<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and upon his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and upon his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and upon the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him: and he shall be <S%H6942>hallowed<s%>, and his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> with him.

Also thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H451>rump<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon them, and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%>; for it is a <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration<s%>:

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H8081>oiled<s%> bread, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7550>wafer<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of the unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> all in the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and in the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and shalt <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>receive<s%> them of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4394>consecration<s%>, and <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and it shall be thy <S%H4490>part<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the wave <S%H8573>offering<s%>, and the <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> of the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%>, which is <S%H5130>waved<s%>, and which is heaved <S%H7311>up<s%>, of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecration<s%>, even of that <S%H834>which<s%> is for <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and of that which is for his <S%H1121>sons<s%>:

And it shall be <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for it is an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%>: and it shall be an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of their peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, even their heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, to be <S%H4888>anointed<s%> therein, and to be <S%H4390%H3027>consecrated<s%> in them.

And that <S%H1121>son<s%> that is <S%H3548>priest<s%> in his stead shall <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, when he <S%H935>cometh<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.
¶ And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecration<s%>, and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the <S%H5536>basket<s%>, by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> those things wherewith the atonement was <S%H3722>made<s%>, to <S%H4390%H3027>consecrate<s%> and to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them: but a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, because they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And if ought of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecrations<s%>, or of the <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H3498>remain<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, then thou shalt <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, because it is <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And thus shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, according to all things which I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H4390%H3027>consecrate<s%> them.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> for <S%H3725>atonement<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, when thou hast made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it, and thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> it, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it; and it shall be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> most <S%H6944%H6944>holy<s%>: whatsoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>.

¶ Now this is that which thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>:

And with the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deal of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the fourth <S%H7253>part<s%> of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>; and the fourth <S%H7243>part<s%> of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, and shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> thereto according to the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and according to the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereof, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

This shall be a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> you, to <S%H1696>speak<s%> there unto thee.
And there I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the tabernacle shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> by my <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> also both <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, to minister to me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.
¶ And I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will be their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, that brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that I may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.
